data.meta_description: There are a wealth of talents out there, if society simply gives folks a chance to show what they can do.
data.text:
18 years of tech disruption in 60 seconds! Apple raced to the top. See Apple‚Äôs near-bankruptcy to $1Trillion story üëâüèªüëâüèª https://lnkd.in/dEuesaE See how Tech Companies #Apple #Google #Amazon have conquered the top four spot from traditional brands from 2000 - 2018 Amazon grew the fastest - see last few seconds! #HP was knocked off the list, so was #Nokia #GE #Cisco #Intel and so many giants of the 2000 era. A stark reminder for incumbents - If you don't innovate, you'll die eventually and a great opportunity for the #AI economy - your humble #MachineLearning #startup today could rule the game in the next decade! So don‚Äôt be a dinosaur ü¶ï and avoid being hit by #startups asteroids ‚òÑÔ∏èüòÖ #brands #disruption #technologytrends #deeplearning Datasource: https://lnkd.in/dpxnmUX Method: https://lnkd.in/dF4mYzN #Download it & use in your presentations üëâüëâ: https://lnkd.in/d573K-9 Media reporting us : Australia News.com: https://lnkd.in/dRXbuFe Swedish blog: https://lnkd.in/d5FJxHJ Ben Lovejoy 9to5mac: https://lnkd.in/dJkbDZ5

This is an incredibly powerful lesson and story on why you should treat people in business with dignity and respect. Judge Victoria Pratt learned that when the courtroom behaves differently, people behave differently. If you're not getting the results in business you want it could be because of how you're behaving. You may not be treating people with respect. You may need to act differently. What you put out comes right back at you. Judge Pratt put out love and what she got back surprised her. Show people the respect they deserve and act accordingly - you'll be shocked by the results :) Video Credit: TED #Motivation #Inspiration
